description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Win32k elevation of privilege vulnerability described in CVE-2023-36011:

1. Download the applicable updates from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the updates corresponding to your version of Windows.
3. Restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The following KB articles provide necessary updates: KB5033379, KB5033375, KB5033372, KB5033369.
- Ensure that your system is up to date with the latest versions specified for either Windows 10 or Windows 11.
- For manual installations, refer to these update package links for more information: [KB5033371](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033371), [KB5033375](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5033375).
